lead_paragraph: Juan Martin del Potro made a successful clay-court comeback after three years away when he beat Dustin Brown 7-6 (2), 6-4 to advance to the second round of the BMW Open on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Del Potro Makes Successful Clay-Court Comeback at BMW Open
headline.main: Del Potro Makes Successful Clay-Court Comeback at BMW Open

snippet: Juan Martin del Potro made a successful clay-court comeback after three years away when he beat Dustin Brown 7-6 (2), 6-4 to advance to the second round of the BMW Open on Wednesday....
